parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create new [[Eden_Editor:_Composition|Composition]]. To create individual entities, use [[create3DENEntity]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''create3DENComposition''' [configPath,  position]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> configPath: [[Config]] - path to ''CfgGroups'' class of a composition
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] in format [[Position]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Eden Entity|Eden Entities]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myComposition = [[create3DENComposition]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>
	[[configFile]] >> "CfgGroups" >> "West" >> "BLU_F" >> "Infantry" >> "BUS_InfSquad",
	[[screenToWorld]] [0.5,0.5]
];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[create3DENEntity]]
</value></part></template></root>
